tags: Miscellaneous Electric Power and Distribution Equipment
Description: This notice has been cancelled
full_summary:
```markdown
**Cancelled Government Tender**
================================

### Notification of Cancellation

The Department of National Defence has uploaded a notice of cancellation for a Request for Proposal (RFP) that was published on August 26, 2022.

### Tender Details

| Tender Number | Solicitation Number | Reference Number |
| --- | --- | --- |
| PW-22-01005192 | W8482-230654/A | W8482-230654/A |

### Cancellation Notice

The tender was cancelled on an unspecified amendment (Update 1). The procurement details provided below are archived for reference purposes.

### Procurement Details

| **Procurement Details** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Category**: Goods (ND) |  |
| **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding |  |
| **Trade Agreements Applied**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), ... |  |

### Delivery Regions

| Region | Name (English) | Name (French) |
| --- | --- | --- |
| BC | British Columbia | Colombie-Britannique |
| NS | Nova Scotia | Nouvelle-Écosse |

### End User Entity

| **End User Entity** | **Address** |
| --- | --- |
| Department of National Defence (MND) | 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada |

### Contact Information

| **Name** | **Title** | **Email** | **Phone** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Chelsea Fowler | Contact Person | chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca | (no phone number provided) |

### Attachment

No attachments are provided with this notice. This cancellation notice is archived in support of procurement transparency and accountability.

Note: This pre-announced cancellation prevents unintended submissions by eligible suppliers. Re-issuance of a subsequent notice is expected; for updates, refer to the [Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data) website periodically.
```(markdown)
